name: OCKCartesianGraphView
desc: Displays a graph view with axis markers.

items.name: init(type: OCKCartesianGraphView.PlotType)
items.desc: Creates a graph view with the specified style type.

items.name: enum OCKCartesianGraphView.PlotType
items.desc: The types of plots this view can display.

items.name: var dataSeries: [OCKDataSeries]
items.desc: The data points displayed in the graph.

items.name: struct OCKDataSeries
items.desc: A single group of data that the chart plots.

items.name: var horizontalAxisMarkers: [String]
items.desc: An array of strings the chart uses for the horizontal axis labels.

items.name: var selectedIndex: Int?
items.desc: The index of the selected label in the x-axis.

items.name: func graphBounds() -> CGRect
items.desc: Returns the maximum and minimum bounds of the graph.

items.name: var xMaximum: CGFloat?
items.desc: The largest x value in the graph.

items.name: var xMinimum: CGFloat?
items.desc: The smallest x value in the graph.

items.name: var yMaximum: CGFloat?
items.desc: The largest y value in the graph.

items.name: var yMinimum: CGFloat?
items.desc: The smallest y value in the graph.
